Articles.Content:
So, this challenge is simple. Anyone can eventually hit Mun with liquid fuel engines, but can you do it with rockets? Build a craft out of any three solid fuel rockets, and steer them into Mun. This requires excellent 'Do It Live!' skills and precision steering. I know it\'s possible, at least with Industrial Fire and Explosions, Inc.\'s 5 segment SRB. I got enough escape velocity to fly past Mun with only two of those suckers.

If you can land safely using only solid fuel rockets (unlimited number) then you will have achieved the impossible and be fittingly hailed as Emperor of Mun.

edit for convenient link.

Simple?!?

You sir, have posed a much difficult proposition here... Getting into munar orbit and crashing seems straightforward enough, but LANDING?

Simple?!?

You sir, have posed a much difficult proposition here... Getting into munar orbit and crashing seems straightforward enough, but LANDING?

Well, that\'s more of a bonus. As I said, that Herculean task can only be completed by the rightful Emperor of Mun.

Well, that\'s more of a bonus. As I said, that Herculean task can only be completed by the rightful Emperor of Mun.

So only Al Gore can complete it?
